statements: SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action_performed FROM access_logs WHERE authorized = true;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT action_performed, COUNT(*) AS action_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY action_performed ORDER BY action_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, authorized FROM access_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, user_id FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM access_logs WHERE authorized = TRUE GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_actions ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_logs WHERE action_performed IN ('Login', 'Logout', 'Update Profile') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT id, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, ip_address FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM unauthorized_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE id = 1
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id, action ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT ip_address, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, ip_address FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE error_message LIKE '%Unauthorized%'
SELECT timestamp, user_id FROM access_logs UNION SELECT timestamp, user_id FROM unauthorized_attempts ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM access_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, username FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT ip_address, timestamp, action FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, username, ip_address FROM access_logs WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_attempts, ip_address FROM unauthorized_attempts GROUP BY ip_address ORDER BY num_attempts DESC;
SELECT username, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS attempt_count FROM unauthorized_attempts GROUP BY ip_address ORDER BY attempt_count DESC;
SELECT access_logs.username, unauthorized_attempts.ip_address FROM access_logs JOIN unauthorized_attempts ON access_logs.ip_address = unauthorized_attempts.ip_address;
SELECT access_logs.username, access_attempts_details.details FROM access_logs LEFT JOIN access_attempts_details ON access_logs.id = access_attempts_details.attempt_id;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, user_id, ip_address FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE reason LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT users.username, roles.name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role = roles.id WHERE roles.name = 'admin'
SELECT DISTINCT ip_address FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY ip_address
SELECT id, username, role FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'user') AND username LIKE 'a%'
SELECT * FROM access_logs
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id FROM access_logs
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT id, action FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = '123456'
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT ip_address, timestamp FROM unauthorized_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin');
